nodes.text: Production IG, also known as Studio I.G., is a Japanese animation studio. Founded in 2007, the company produces animated television series, shorts, and films.
The studio contributed to the design of Nahdar Vebb for "Lair of Grievous," an episode of Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
Production IG also partnered with Lucasfilm Ltd. on the forthcoming Disney+ series Star Wars: Visions. The studio produced the short film The Ninth Jedi for the series.
